title: What does this symbol mean?
body: So there is basically a mobile symbol beside my friends name and it says mobile can anyone tell me what it means?

replies.body: Surprise Summoner! We have a [**new mobile app**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207523063) you can use to talk with your friends when you're not actually on the client! It should be up in all regions now, and you can find it on the Apple App Store and Google Play on Android.
Thanks for telling me i am going to download it now XD
